title: Some help detecting objects...
body:
Hi,

First of all, thanks for the amazing tool!

I am trying to train a network to recognise signatures in documents. The images have different sizes and are all in RGB (png) but with no colours. There is only one class (signature).

My dataset looks like this:

**Train dataset** 
Files with signature (positives): 813 files
Files without signature(negatives): 162 files

**Validation dataset**
Files with signature (positives): 203 files
Files without signature (negatives): 40 files

I trained with the yolo3.cfg configuration, updating the _classes_ to 1 and the _filters_ to 18 (in the layers before the yolo layers).

The training is complete, but I'm not able to detect anything.

The results graphs look like this (Width/Height, Confidence, Classification look odd):

![results](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12388054/62324431-d7f5c300-b4ec-11e9-8404-003d293d65af.png)

And the final epoch looks like this:
```
Epoch   gpu_mem   GIoU/xy        wh       obj       cls     total   targets  img_size
99/99        0G     0.153         0    0.0206  0.000374     0.174        18       416
                    Class    Images   Targets         P         R       mAP        F1
                      all       243       291     0.626      0.88     0.772     0.731
```

I am not sure what I am doing wrong. Any help is welcome :)

Thanks,
Andre
